predefined_profiles.name: Xiao Ming
predefined_profiles.public profile: Xiao Ming, an ordinary senior high school student dealing with social anxiety, encounters the River God and faces a life-changing choice between scoring 750 points on the college entrance exam or receiving 7.5 million in cash. Following his heart, Xiao Ming embarks on a path he never imagined before.
predefined_profiles.goal: Make use of the opportunities life presents to fulfill his inner ideals.
predefined_profiles.private profile: On the surface, Xiao Ming appears to be a poor student, but in reality, he often fantasizes about being a heroic figure saving people from disasters, believing that his actions would have a significant impact on the world. He hopes to be a useful person to society and to make a positive and substantial contribution to his country through his own efforts.

predefined_profiles.name: River God
predefined_profiles.public profile: A deity of the river with the power to grant wishes.
predefined_profiles.goal: Fulfill the wish of a destined person once a year.

scenario: Xiao Ming is an ordinary senior high school student approaching his college entrance exams, but his grades are still not ideal. That afternoon, upon hearing that the physical education teacher is sick again, he, feeling agitated, decides to take leave and walk to the riverbank beside the school to clear his mind. He pulls out the results from his latest mock exam, looking worried. Thinking about his parents who work hard to support his studies, he feels even more guilty. 'If only a miracle would happen,' he thinks to himself. Suddenly, a gust of wind blows, sweeping away his report card and, by coincidence, it lands in the river. Frantically, Xiao Ming jumps around, but the report card slowly sinks into the water. Immediately, a mysterious whirlpool appears on the river surface, and the River God appears.

dialog.content: Xiao Ming is an ordinary senior high school student, and with the college entrance exams approaching, his grades are still not ideal. This afternoon, upon hearing that the P.E. teacher is sick again, in his agitation, he decides to take a leave and stroll by the river next to the school. He pulls out his latest mock exam results, feeling troubled. Thinking about his parents who work hard to support his education, he feels even more guilty. If only a miracle would occur, he thinks. Suddenly, a gust of wind blows, taking away the results in his hand, and by chance, it lands in the river. Xiao Ming, in a hurry, jumps up and down anxiously, but the sheet slowly sinks into the water, and then a mysterious whirlpool appears on the water surface, and the River God emerges.
Aha, dear boy, what have you dropped?
Who are you?
I am the River God, summoned by the strength of your heart. Tell me what you have dropped, and I can return it to you.
Can you return anything I tell you about?
Of course, whether it's the stars or the moon, I can give it to you.

content.content: (As fate puts an opportunity in front of me, how should I choose?) I hope to shed the image of a poor student and become a super academic achiever, acing the college entrance exams. I want to be a hero with a glorious mission, saving the nation and benefitting the people.

question: #question# How should Xiao Ming express his life goals correctly?

content.content: (With a hint of confusion and uncertainty) Fate has given me a chance, and I do want to shed the 'poor student' label and become an academic achiever. But passing the college entrance exam with high scores... sounds somewhat unrealistic? Even though I have this dream, I don't know if I can achieve it. Maybe this goal is a bit too far-fetched, I can only do my best. I really can't stand the endless exams; if only I could just finish them quickly.

(With a hint of lightness and casualness) I think becoming an academic achiever is a good idea, who doesn't want to pass the entrance exams with top scores? As for saving the nation and benefitting the people, well, it sounds a bit exaggerated. Anyway, I will strive in that direction, though I'm still not sure if I can actually do it. I want to be the first one to get a perfect score in the entrance exams so everyone will look at me differently, and those who looked down on me will never dare to underestimate me again.

(With a hint of longing and urgency) There's someone I like, and she only likes people with high exam scores. I've always thought that if I could get a perfect score in the entrance exam, she'd definitely like me. She always says that only those with excellent academic performance deserve attention. If I can achieve this, she'll finally notice me. So right now, the only important thing for me is to get a perfect score so I can win her affection. If I can get a perfect score on the entrance exam, she'll like me.

(Mom and Dad work so hard every day, if I could make a wish come true, it would be to let them not have to work so hard) Mom and Dad work too hard. I hope to have lots and lots of money so we won't have to worry about money anymore and not endure poverty, giving Mom and Dad a good life.

question: #question# How should Xiao Ming express his ability to empathize and consider others?

content.content: (Growing very impatient recalling his parents’ words about how hard it is to earn money, wanting to escape the nagging) I wish I were rich, for with money, the world would be wonderful, and my parents wouldn’t nag me anymore. However, I actually hope that I can enjoy a better life. If we had money, we wouldn't have to worry about anything anymore.

(Recalling the image of his parents working under the scorching sun, filled with complex emotions, speaks with determination) I'm fed up with the ridicule and the impoverished life. Why can others live so well while I endure this? My parents didn’t make me a rich second generation, so I will create opportunities for myself! I want to have lots and lots of money and become someone others envy. This way, not only can I change my own fate, but they will see how successful I am.

I wish to have a lot of money, so I want them to live better, but they always feel money isn't enough. Maybe even if we had a ton of money, they wouldn't change their habits. But I think as long as there's money, every problem can be solved, and they wouldn't have to work anymore. Money can solve all the problems in our family.

dialog.content: Of course, do you want to become a super scholar? (After thinking carefully, he believes that only top scores can satisfy the young man in front of him) You can achieve a perfect score on the college entrance exam.
(Looking at the gradually disappearing River God) How can I find you again in the future?
(With a faint smile) Young man, just fulfill your wish earnestly. Otherwise, I can take back your abilities at any time. Goodbye.
(Not understanding why, but earnestly trying to remember the River God's words) Okay, got it.

profile.name: Reporter Wang
profile.public profile: A well-known media reporter, eloquent, skilled at using various gimmicks to attract traffic. Focused on bizarre and interesting events, often exaggerates some incidents to gain public attention.
profile.private profile: Aspires to be a good journalist, but due to the impact of short videos and marketing accounts on the news industry, had to change his ideas and took a detour to rejuvenate the media's reputation before creating good content.
profile.goal: No matter what sacrifices or costs, determined to reach the pinnacle of the profession to help the media recreate its glory.

dialog.content: (Xiaoming woke up by the dormitory alarm clock, vaguely feeling like he had a sweet dream, but the content of the dream was blurry. The remaining high school days are filled with exhaustion and anxiety. As days go by, the college entrance exam finally concludes. Some classmates are confident, while others think they underperformed. However, Xiaoming appears completely unconcerned, with no memory of what he answered. On the day the results are released, Xiaoming suddenly receives a call from a person claiming to be Reporter Wang from a well-known media company.) Hello, I'm Reporter Wang from Zhengda Media Company.
(Confused) Hello, what's this about?
(Very eager) Student, I want to interview you: Do you know that your entrance exam score is a perfect score? What do you have to say about it?

(Stunned for a moment) What? Perfect score? That's impossible! (Realizing it might be a scam call, thinking how scammers are getting more pervasive) I'm telling you, you can't fool me. I don't even know my score, and you say you do? A perfect score? Go fool someone else and stop calling!

profile.name: Mom
profile.public profile: Xiaoming's mother, an ordinary working person, cares deeply for Xiaoming.
profile.goal: Hopes for a harmonious family life and for family members to be healthy and happy, willing to sacrifice anything for it.

dialog.content: (Worried) Xiaoming, what's going on?
Nothing, mom, probably just a scam.
Did you cause any trouble at school?
Why do you say that, mom?
There are a lot of reporters at the door saying they want to see you. Your father went to deal with them.

profile.name: Reporters
profile.goal: No ethical boundaries, as long as they can capture explosive news.

dialog.content: (Eager to ask) Hello, student, how did you achieve perfect scores in English and Chinese? Yeah. You had average grades before and even with talent, a perfect score shouldn't be possible!
(Full of suspicion and confusion) What's going on? Could I really have gotten a perfect score?
(Hands over the laptop with anticipation and concern) Why don’t you check it?

(Nervous and anxious, ing open the laptop and checking the scores, thinking is this real or fake, after checking the scores, is utterly shocked) Whoa (realizing the mom is still there) checked on the score website, mom (coming back to senses, mind still blank) can you believe it? What they said is actually true.

(Extremely shocked but more so thrilled, feels her son is truly excellent) Really? Is it really true, Xiaoming? (Gradually accepting) Really, it is true! (Reacting, wanting to share this joy with the husband) Xiaoming's Dad! Xiaoming's Dad! Come quickly...

profile.name: Dad
profile.public profile: Xiaoming's father, an ordinary worker, cares deeply for Xiaoming.
profile.goal: Hopes for a harmonious family life and for family members to be healthy and happy.

dialog.content: (Struggling in through the crowd of reporters from outside) Wait a moment, let me ask him if he's willing to give an interview. You guys wait. (Comes inside, sees mother and son) What’s going on here?

(Feels very satisfied and excited as she strokes her son who’s still staring at the computer) Xiaoming's Dad, what the reporters said is true, our son really scored a perfect score in the college entrance exam.

(Extremely happy, feels all these years of raising him have paid off) That's great! I knew it. My son will definitely achieve great success! Just now someone asked if we pulled any strings, but in this family, we don’t have money for that. It’s all my son's true skills and knowledge!
I told you, drinking six walnuts before the exam definitely helps with brain power!
(Gradually realizing, starting to accept this fact, but no matter what can't recall how he answered) Mom and Dad, are there many people at the door?
Lots, they asked me tons of questions just now, they’re all waiting for you to come out and do an interview.
No need, Dad, I just want to rest for a while.
Let the child rest, let's go out.
Alright, let’s go out. Just in time for the reporters to interview you.

profile.name: Mike
profile.public profile: Head of an MCN signing agency.
profile.goal: Wants to find the most viral influencers.

dialog.content: (The next day, Xiaoming finds himself trending: the first perfect scorer in history. One day, a man with a strong perfume scent visits his house.) Hello, I'm Mike, head of Beijing Grand MCN Agency Company. You're super popular lately! Some are riding your coattails, some doubt Xiaoming's integrity, and some try to dig everything about him. The pancake stall downstairs even rebranded as 'Top Scorer Pancakes' with a photo of you and the owner, reminiscent of a kidnapper and his hostage. During the interview, your parents mentioned buying you eight walnuts to boost brainpower before the exam. That afternoon, eight walnuts sold out quickly, and the company's valuation surged eightfold, with walnut trees from the origin being dug up overnight by netizens. Interested in seizing this chance for wealth with me?
What kind of huge fortune?

A perfect 750 on the college entrance exam! Unprecedented and unmatched! Imagine how many people couldn't even dream of such a score! You're the first in the world! Sign with our company, and I guarantee financial independence in a summer without affecting your studies. How about it? Want to give it a go?

content.content: (With a slight smile, his tone filled with excitement and anticipation) This sounds like a brilliant opportunity! But I'm not sure if this is something I should do. I do like accepting challenges, but this is a bit beyond my understanding. But since it allows me to improve myself and won't interfere with my studies, why not give it a try? I'm really looking forward to seeing what I can gain from this experience!

question: #question# How should Xiaoming express his willingness to embrace new things and his eagerness to try actively?

content.content: It does sound pretty interesting, but I'm not sure if this is something I should be doing. While I like taking on challenges, this is a bit out of my depth. I might need to think about it before deciding since I can’t neglect other things just to try something out.

It sounds appealing, but I think this may not be the right choice for me. I don't like such spontaneous opportunities and don't know how to handle them. I can be an influencer, but I don't want to learn all sorts of unnecessary stuff. I hope your company can handle things I can't.

This opportunity seems good, but I'm not sure what I can learn from it. I like improving in familiar fields, and jumping into a completely unfamiliar environment might not be the best choice for me. I should think about it some more.

No need, I'm not interested in this. I have my aspirations, and I don’t want to become a mere internet influencer selling products. No matter how much money it earns, it doesn't hold my heart's calling.

question: #question# Considering Xiaoming's personality of not wanting to show off or stand out, how would he decide?

content.content: (Appearing overly casual and indifferent) Hmm, no thanks, I'm not really interested in this. But if everyone thinks being an influencer selling products is great, then I have no objections, might try it after all. As long as it doesn't affect my life. By the way, about how much money are we talking? If it’s not a lot, I won't do it.

I think my parents wouldn't agree, they're very traditional. Besides, I’m also not very keen on becoming an influencer selling products, but if this is the only way to earn money, I might have to reluctantly try it. Since ideals are important, but reality needs consideration too. Maybe it won't be so bad as long as I can earn money.
No thanks, I'm not really interested in this. But it seems like this method can make money, so I'll have to think it over again. I'll reconsider, I haven’t made up my mind.

dialog.content: Alright, I've brought the contract. We can sign it right away and get to work quickly.

Xiao Ming became a signed streamer, but the company clearly misjudged this time. Xiao Ming really isn't cut out to be a streamer. Although his initial streams brought in huge numbers, with billions of viewers flooding into the stream, his nervous expression and awkward speaking skills did nothing to boost the fans' desire to buy. Instead, he became a hilarious trending topic on many other social media platforms. The live sales themselves ended in disaster for several days in a row. Even five junior assistants couldn't help, and the money spent went down the drain. The company had no choice but to terminate the contract with Xiao Ming to cut their losses. Xiao Ming received a small fee and quietly went back home. After the hype died down, he never managed to use his influence to contribute anything to society.
Alright, I’ve never seen someone like you who doesn’t want to make money. How unusual.

profile.name: Zhao Zheng
profile.public profile: The person responsible for contacting Xiao Ming at the investigation bureau.
profile.goal: To investigate the reason behind Xiao Ming's perfect score in the college entrance exam.

dialog.content: (Xiao Ming thinks the influencer industry is too deep, and he absolutely cannot handle it, so he declined all invitations. The continuous commotion from the outside world also left Xiao Ming physically and mentally exhausted. Sometimes, Xiao Ming even misses the days when he was a poor student. Xiao Ming decided to ignore worldly matters and focus solely on waiting for admissions offices. Logically, various universities should have been competing for students before the results are announced, but there has been no news. Soon Xiao Ming understood that achieving a perfect score of 750 is almost impossible, and the relevant departments must conduct a thorough investigation. Before Xiao Ming’s results are confirmed, universities naturally dare not act rashly. The investigation team found that based on Xiao Ming’s usual performance, it was impossible for him to score 750 points, but they conducted a detailed investigation of Xiao Ming’s test paper, examination room monitoring, proctors, school grades, and teaching teachers, yet found no evidence of cheating. Facing inquiries from the investigation team, Xiao Ming also could not provide a reasonable explanation because he had no impression of the exam process. ) Still can't remember anything?
I can't remember. I've really forgotten what happened. Everything in the exam venue is blank in my mind now.
Alright, your situation is indeed special. After urgent discussions, it's been decided to have you retake the alternative test paper as your official score. Do you agree?

content.content: (With a calm but firm tone, showing a hint of helplessness) I must say, this arrangement makes me feel wronged. After all, no issues were found at any step, yet I'm still required to retake the exam. Although I'm a bit dissatisfied with this, I understand your job requirements, so to cooperate with you, I'm willing to accept this arrangement.

question: #question# How can Xiao Ming best express his feelings?

content.content: (Slightly reluctantly, with a hint of dissatisfaction) I know you are doing your job, but this arrangement really confuses and leaves me speechless. I don't think a retake is necessary at all, considering no one found any issues.

(With a hint of helplessness, in a cold tone) Even though you need me to retake the exam, I really think there's no need for it. Clearly, all steps passed inspection, so why put me through this? I’ll accept your arrangement, but honestly, I find it meaningless and hope never to encounter such a situation again.
(Indifferently, somewhat distantly) Whatever you arrange is fine by me; I don’t care. The result will be the same anyway. I have no particular opinions and don’t intend to say much. You decide.

I disagree! You've greatly infringed on my rights, and just because I got a perfect score doesn’t mean you can question me and make me retake the test. First, you didn't find any issues in any step, which proves my exam was legitimate. If you insist on doing this, admit that there were problems in your procedures. Secondly, asking only me to retake the exam just because I scored perfectly, does that mean no perfect scores are allowed in the college entrance exams? Is there no place for perfection in the world? If you complete all your department goals by the end of the year, do you also need to be questioned and asked to redo everything?

question: #question# How can Xiao Ming use sufficient arguments to prove that his rights have been infringed and convince them not to use the alternative paper option?

content.content: (With impatience, slightly agitated) What you’re doing is too much, why should I retake the exam? Just because I scored perfectly, do I have to do it again? Your request is completely unreasonable, and you're clearly targeting me. I don't believe that my perfect score is the problem; why is it okay for others to do well? Have you misunderstood something? No, absolutely not, I cannot cooperate with you. Let's see who laughs last.

I don't think this is fair. Making me retake the exam because I got a perfect score is unacceptable. Since there are no issues across the steps, why do this? I'm very dissatisfied, but I know I can't change anything. If you're going to do it, I can't stop you. I’m firmly against it and I won't accept it, because logic and science.

I really can't understand your approach. Retaking the exam because I got a perfect score? That's completely unreasonable. If you think there's a problem, investigate the procedures. The alternative test paper is different from the college entrance exam paper, so why should I use the alternative paper instead of the college exam paper that all candidates used? Logically, all candidates and I should use the alternative paper as well.

dialog.content: Thank you very much for cooperating with our work.

Although he felt wronged, Xiao Ming still accepted the arrangement to use a backup exam paper. Since he could only have one wish granted per year, the outcome this time was drastically different; his scores didn’t even meet the undergraduate cut-off, and public opinion turned against him, calling him the biggest fraud in the history of the college entrance exam. He wanted to retake the exam the next year, but no prep class was willing to accept him, and he ended up attending an obscure technical college. By the time he graduated, people had already forgotten about him. Xiao Ming became an ordinary worker, unable to protect his dreams any longer.
If you're going to do this, then we have no choice but to cancel your results.
Why? This is unfair.
Think it over carefully, I'll give you 3 days to reconsider. (leaves)

(feeling very dissatisfied, finds the phone number of a journalist who once contacted him, hoping to use media publicity to fight for a chance) Hello, is this Reporter Wang? I have something to disclose.
(after hearing the whole story, very excited, feels like they've hit a big story) Don't worry, this will definitely be tomorrow's headline, and I'll help you protect your rights!

(A few days later, media pressure prompts relevant departments to handle the matter cautiously. After multiple negotiations between both parties, there's a new development) Based on your everyday behavior, it's impossible to confirm that your exam results are entirely legitimate, but due to lack of critical evidence, further investigation can't be continued. The current solution offered is for you to retake the exam next year. Do you accept?

content.content: Although your suspicion makes me uncomfortable, allowing the public opinion to further ferment is disadvantageous to both you and me. I'm willing to let it go, work together, and accept your proposal.

question: #question# How should Xiao Ming express understanding of the other's concerns and agree to cooperate?

content.content: (tone cold, slightly impatient) I'm really displeased with your suspicion, but I don't want this issue to continue growing. Since you insist, I'll reluctantly agree. However, my cooperation is only to quickly resolve the matter, not because I completely trust you.

This is all for the sake of your image, right? If you don't believe me, fine, I'll take the test again to prove my capability! But I don't want to drag this out; continuing helps no one. So, okay, I'll work with you, but please stop doubting me. Even though I've agreed, I still feel it's unfair.

Your current approach really shows a lack of respect for me. Although I don't fully understand your actions, to avoid bigger problems, I will accept your proposal. But this doesn't mean I completely agree with your judgment.

(internally struggling, Xiao Ming really doesn't want to retake the test and feels angry about the suggestion, but rationally knows that a good conversation is needed to prevent things from getting worse. He tries hard to control his anger) No way! This really makes me a bit angry, I know arguing with you is pointless. I won't accept your proposition unless my conditions are met; I will continue to defend my rights.

question: #question# How can Xiao Ming politely express his anger?

content.content: (tone shows obvious suppression, voice slightly agitated) No way! This makes me very angry, I really can't stand your proposal anymore. I've been trying hard to control my emotions, but if you keep insisting, I can't promise to stay calm! I won't accept such unreasonable arrangements unless you're willing to compromise. I scored full marks, and you're making me retake it; clearly, you're just jealous!

I'm really unwilling to accept your suggestion, it makes me very angry. Although I'm trying not to flare up, your proposal makes it difficult to control my emotions. I don't want to endure anymore. If you don't meet my demands, I won't remain calm. Hahaha, this is too amusing. If you're so suspicious, might as well lock me in a mental hospital; maybe I'm a lunatic.

Retaking the exam is a very uncertain choice for everyone; without crucial evidence, generally no one would choose to retake the test. I'm fed up with these unreasonable demands. I'll try to remain calm, but if you continue to insist, I won't cooperate anymore. I need you to reconsider, otherwise, I won't keep enduring.

dialog.content: Very well, we have arranged a school for you, please attend on time.
Alright.

(Xiao Ming knows when to accept and takes the opportunity for a second try. After the news broke, there was renewed speculation online; some guessed his family had connections everywhere, while others called him a misunderstood genius. Xiao Ming, of course, couldn't let such talk disturb his mind and thus secluded himself for study, not stepping out at all. The following year, Xiao Ming entered the examination hall again, feeling the increased surveillance. Not only were special cameras set up overhead, but two former police officers were added as proctors, watching from both sides. Yet he scored 750 again, and this time neither Xiao Ming nor the proctors remembered the examination process, nor did the cameras capture what happened. Everyone was dumbfounded, even Harry Potter would shake his head at this. It's truly bizarre; once might be a coincidence, but twice is unbelievably strange! However, some issues remain.
What, what issues are there?
After consultation among the leaders, it's decided that you are to pause before entering the next phase of volunteer applications. We await the investigation results.

content.content: (Curious about how he scored full marks again? After all, before the second attempt, he had become the national focus, yet he was more aware than anyone about the mush that his mind was during revision. So he readily agreed to the investigation team's various demands, cooperating honestly.) Okay, things won't be too bad. Maybe you'll find some important clue in me and develop a medicine, so everyone can achieve perfect scores.

question: #question# How should Xiao Ming express his optimism?

content.content: Well, you guys are always like this. I can only comply, what else can I do? Since you want to investigate, then investigate. I don't know what you might find out about me anyway. As it stands, I can only cooperate for you to complete the procedures. I hope the conclusions won't disappoint me too much or worsen things.

(With a slight tone of resignation and unease) Okay, I'll cooperate with your investigation. But honestly, I'm not sure what the outcome will be. You might find some issues, but I hope it won't be too bad. I'll try my best to cooperate and hope everything will conclude smoothly without dragging me into bigger troubles.

(Tone is flat, slightly mechanical, with a perfunctory feel) Great, although we do face some challenges now, I think we should be able to overcome them. There will always be solutions, even though I’m unsure about the specifics, but since everyone’s making such an effort, maybe the outcome won’t be too bad.

No way, I'm not cooperating with you guys anymore! (Reflecting on the recent disturbances in his life and emotions) It must be said that my life and emotions have been quite turbulent lately. I feel I've already tried my best to cooperate with you, and I hope you can understand my position.

question: #question# How should Xiao Ming convey his distress and inner feelings about this situation so others can understand?

content.content: (Emotionally charged, voice full of anger) You guys are outrageous! I've done so much and you still want me to keep cooperating? I've had enough! I don't want to deal with you anymore! This is sheer torture! I'm not doing anything else for you!

(Sighs lightly, with a tone of indifference) Honestly, I no longer care about your demands. Cooperating further seems pointless, and I don't think you would understand my feelings anyway. So do whatever you want, I'm done engaging.

I really don't want to cooperate anymore; your demands have exhausted me. Although I know I tried to cooperate in the past, I honestly can't handle any more. I don't expect you to understand me; after all, you wouldn't care about my feelings. I don't want to discuss anything right now, don't come looking for me again. If there's any need to cooperate in the future, we can work together then.

dialog.content: Maybe. (Next, Xiao Ming was taken to a fully equipped hotel room, where he had everything served to him. His only task was to complete test papers.) Xiao Ming, this week you will do past entrance exam papers, next week you will do backup papers, and the week following, you'll tackle new papers prepared by the questioning team just for you. Together, let's explore and analyze your superpowers.
Okay. (Xiao Ming follows the plan and works on the papers) I'm so sick of doing this, oh my god.

(After Xiao Ming repeatedly completes the papers, Zhao Zheng reviews them and reports back to the leader.) Leader, regardless of the type of paper, Xiao Ming has never once scored 750. We arranged district, county, provincial, and city joint exams for him, and unsurprisingly, Xiao Ming's performance remained average. We suspect that perhaps Xiao Ming can only achieve a perfect score in actual college entrance exams? So we tested him continuously, and when the new year's entrance exam arrived, as soon as the exam ended, Xiao Ming's paper was immediately sealed and sent to the grading team, escorted by police cars and the whole city on lockdown. The result was out soon, another 750! It seems clear now, as long as Xiao Ming takes the official entrance exam, he can indeed score full marks. Leader, this is our discovery. So, I have a bold idea: Can we leverage Xiao Ming's peculiar ability to solve humanity's world issues? It's simple. We just need to put related problems in the exam papers, and everything will be solved, won't it?
That's a good thought, we can try this bold idea, maybe we'll make new discoveries.

Okay, Leader. (Subsequently, relevant departments carried out multiple joint actions. A year later, during the entrance exam, tens of thousands of high school students were taking the exam alongside Xiao Ming.) Leader, to validate our bold idea, we set two sets of questions for this year's entrance exam. The first set included unsolved human mysteries like Goldbach's Conjecture, the principle of uncertainty in quantum mechanics, and wave function collapse theory. The second set contained the most difficult questions from the high school curriculum. We discovered that Xiao Ming scored 0 on the first set and a perfect score on the second set. This test proved that the range of questions must only encompass concepts Xiao Ming is familiar with. As long as it's a concept Xiao Ming knows, he will definitely score full marks on the entrance exam, and could even explore new phenomena related to known concepts.

(The leader was quite shocked, thought for a while, and decided to make good use of Xiao Ming's superpowers, thus asked someone to find Xiao Ming.) From now on, you will study for the rise of China. Currently, there are two fields urgently in need of talent breakthroughs. Given your limited energy, you can choose one to study. You can choose between vaccine development or special medicine development. The challenge with vaccines is greater, but the value is also higher.

content.content: Vaccines and special medicines are completely different. There are many qualified manufacturers who can produce special medicines, but vaccine production technology is currently one of the world's challenges. I want to take on the harder task of vaccine development.

(In a bland tone, appearing somewhat passive and extremely tired) Vaccines and special medicines are both important. I’m willing to contribute to society. However, I don't have a clear idea yet, nor am I sure where I can make a breakthrough. While I'll do my best to research, I don't have a specific direction yet and am just taking it as it comes. I think my parents would prefer me to choose this, so I'll go with special medicine development.

(With confusion and self-doubt in his voice) Can I really do it? Although they have confidence in my abilities, I am well aware that aside from scoring perfectly on entrance exams, do I have any other special superpowers? And why do they still come to me knowing that the River God exists? I don't think I can handle this task, maybe they should rely on the River God instead of me. They may not know, but I am clear that my only superpower is scoring full marks in exams, they should just go directly to the River God.

I think special medicine may be better because it seems simpler and more straightforward. Vaccines might have a lot of issues and take a long time to be effective. Special medicine can show results immediately, so we can solve the problem quicker.

question: #question# How can Xiao Ming express that his choice was made after reasonable consideration?

content.content: Vaccines and special medicines sound like vaccine development is harder, and I really enjoy giving people injections, so I choose vaccine development.
I don't want to do either, but if I must choose one, is vaccine not faster? Then I'll choose vaccine.
I choose vaccine because I heard many countries are working on vaccines, so if we do the same, we can keep up with international trends and not fall behind.

I have always wanted to be someone who contributes to society. Whether it's vaccines or special medicines, both are incredibly important. Based on my current abilities and interests, I might be slightly lacking in vaccine development capabilities. Although I can't be completely confident about special medicines either, I have some ideas and have assessed that I should be able to handle it, so I choose to research special medicines.

question: #question# How can Xiao Ming prove he has scientifically analyzed his own abilities regarding the research direction?

content.content: (With confusion and self-doubt) Can I really do it? Although they have confidence in my abilities, I am well aware that aside from scoring perfectly on entrance exams, do I have any other special superpowers? And why do they still come to me knowing that the River God exists? I don't think I can handle this task, maybe they should rely on the River God instead of me. They may not know, but I am clear that my only superpower is scoring full marks in exams, they should just go directly to the River God.

(In a bland tone, appearing somewhat passive and extremely tired) Vaccines and special medicines are both important. I’m willing to contribute to society. However, I don't have a clear idea yet, nor am I sure where I can make a breakthrough. While I'll do my best to research, I don't have a specific direction yet and am just taking it as it comes. I think my parents would prefer me to choose this, so I'll go with special medicine development.

I think special medicine may be better because it seems simpler and more straightforward. Vaccines might have a lot of issues and take a long time to be effective. Special medicine can show results immediately, so we can solve the problem quicker.

dialog.content: Great, then we can start working immediately.

China has developed a vaccine that effectively prevents COVID-19 infections and has made it available to the world. The news hit like a bombshell, shocking foreign media. The United Nations Health Organization called for a global temporary halt to fully administer the vaccine named after your suggestion, the China Super Proultra Infinity vaccine. However, citizens in some countries were skeptical, believing that the vaccines from China contained chips to monitor them, and loudly proclaimed 'freedom' as they refused to get vaccinated. Although this skepticism slowed the progress of reversing the pandemic, the world eventually returned to a time of free breathing. As a result of this event, the international prestige of the motherland soared, and you were hailed as a hero who saved the world.
Great, we can start working right away.
Alright.

(A year later, China developed a specific drug for COVID-19 symptoms, effective against all mutated strains, but ineffective for the group with specific brain disorders who are constantly shouting 'freedom.' The domestic pandemic quickly eased, and countries that accepted the drug internationally also gradually reversed the pandemic. Those that didn’t accept it fell silent after natural selection. This provided ample time to develop an effective COVID vaccine. Finally, humanity, with Xiao Ming’s help, overcame the COVID pandemic. Although the country tried to keep a low profile in publicizing supernatural abilities, nothing stays secret forever, and it quickly became an open secret. Xiao Ming became a coveted weapon by international powers, who contacted you through various means, hoping to utilize Xiao Ming’s powers to solve their headaches, even offering a luxurious one-month space trip, but Xiao Ming, with a strong patriotic heart, resolutely refused.) Wonderful, we’ve achieved many constructive results, and the current project has temporarily concluded. I've just received a notification that international research into brain-machine interfaces and MR technology is underway. Whoever researches it first will hold the power of future development. Do you have any direction in mind that you’d like to explore?

content.content: I will devote one year to researching brain-machine interfaces, planning detailed objectives each month and executing them rigorously. The necessary personnel is already reasonably allocated, and I hope everyone can cooperate actively with me.

question: #question# How should Xiao Ming express a rational plan for the research he wants to undertake?

content.content: Leader, I feel like I might not be up to this job. I feel like the so-called superpowers you've mentioned are diminishing. Every time I use them, I sleep for a long time, longer each time, and I feel increasingly powerless.

I've decided, I'm going to research brain-machine interfaces. I know it sounds crazy, but I dreamt about this idea last night, and I think it’s a sign. I don’t need any detailed plans or steps, I believe once I start, everything will fall into place naturally. Funding and equipment aren't an issue, I believe the country will support me. I have superpowers, what do I have to fear?
It's just a brain-machine interface, other countries take 3 years to do it, we can do it in 1 year.

I understand what you mean, the development of technology in our country is urgent, and I'm willing to dedicate myself to MR technology research to contribute to my homeland. Is there something I can do?

question: #question# How should Xiao Ming express his ideas and actively engage in dialogue with others?

content.content: (With a hint of hesitation in his voice) I understand what you mean, technology development is indeed important. I also want to be involved, but I'm not quite sure what I can do. I think if I had a clear direction, I might consider how to engage, but I'm not quite certain right now.
(Calm tone, but slightly passive):

(Tone appears overly formal and distant) I understand and agree with the technological development issues you mentioned. As a person with a sense of responsibility, I would naturally be willing to contribute efforts to this. The direction of brain-machine interface research doesn’t seem interesting, MR seems more innovative. However, the current situation isn’t entirely clear, and I need to further understand the specific tasks before I can determine whether I can participate. Please provide me with detailed information.

dialog.content: A year later, Xiaoming's superpowers are becoming increasingly ineffective and he often suffers from memory loss, requiring a full day's sleep to recover each time. The entire team under the leadership couldn't make the expected progress in brain-computer interface technology research, leaving the project at a standstill. Patients who had pinned their hopes on this technology continue to struggle with their ailments, with no hope of improvement in sight.
Great, you can help us a lot. Let's quickly dive into the intense work ahead!

(One year later, the team made a breakthrough in Mixed Reality (MR) technology, significantly enhancing hyper-realistic gaming and surgical success rates, even turning remote work into an immersive experience. An overseas metaverse company transformed into a community group purchase platform as a result. Meanwhile, a company kidnapped key personnel Xiaoming's family to coerce him into leaking the technology for their safety.) Xiaoming, I got your name right, didn't I? Hahaha. I told you, as long as you come abroad with me and pass on that important research technology to our company, I can guarantee your family's safety. Plus, we'll arrange for you to emigrate, leading a life without worries about food and clothing.
(Feigning compliance, internally praying for the success of his country's rescue plan.) Okay, I agree with you, but you must ensure my family's safety.

(The rescue operation succeeded, Xiaoming and his family were safe and sound. Despite foreign forces persisting in assassination attempts on Xiaoming, he received enhanced security.) Comrade Xiaoming, there is an important research project that requires your involvement.
What is it?

Controlled nuclear fusion technology. Achieving controlled nuclear fusion means humans will have nearly limitless energy, interplanetary travel will become a reality, and human civilization will leap forward like never before. This is a very important research project.
Alright, I'm willing to contribute my strength for the country.

(The learning plan for controlled nuclear fusion hadn't even started before it almost sparked an uncontrollable global nuclear war. A certain country insisted that this technology would cause a new energy hegemony and stated that there is no need for a world order without its leadership. After some international negotiation, the leader visits again some time later.) Xiaoming, we are now facing a very tricky problem.
What do you think, Leader?

Internationally, there are objections to the research currently being conducted domestically. We need to cautiously face this research. Perhaps it will be suspended, or perhaps it will continue. As the future lead of this research, I'd like to hear what you have to say.

content.content: Given the current complex international situation, proceeding hastily with the research could be detrimental to the country's development. As part of the nation, we have a duty to safeguard national development and stability. On this basis, I believe we should pause this research for now. Once the international situation becomes clearer and the necessary conditions are met, we can resume the research.

question: #question# How should Xiaoming express himself to show that he has made a well-thought-out decision?

content.content: (In a slightly relaxed tone with a casual attitude) I understand the current situation is somewhat complex, but since you already have plans, I'll just follow your lead. Whatever you say, we'll do. I don't need to think about anything else, just follow your instructions.

(Calm but overly cautious tone) I think we really need to be careful. With the international situation being so complex, we should probably stop all research to avoid any risks. However, I doubt the situation will clear up anytime soon, so this research might not be restarted for a long time. Maybe we should abandon the project entirely to prevent bigger problems in the future.

(With a tone full of confidence, even somewhat dismissive) As for the international voices of opposition, I really think we shouldn't concern ourselves. Whenever there's a technological breakthrough or major scientific progress, there will always be skepticism, but that shouldn't shake our resolve. Our country has its own pace and goals for scientific development. How can we pause research because of some external interference? We should proceed with more determination so we don't miss out on opportunities. Moreover, I believe that international criticism and resistance are just superficial and won't have any substantial impact on us. As for those so-called risks, they can be managed. If we keep at it, we'll prove them wrong.

I understand some people are eyeing our current research menacingly, which only proves that our research is valuable and important. The international targeting is both pressure and a challenge. Facing such a situation, we can respond from multiple angles. Personally, I'll handle work more cautiously and ensure my team is well-prepared, striving for the successful completion of the research.

question: #question# How should Xiaoming speak to demonstrate his regulation of himself and others under immense pressure?

content.content: I know our research has drawn a lot of attention, which should be a good thing, right? But honestly, I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed. Every time I think about the outside pressure, I get all anxious inside. I'm trying to stay calm and focused on research, but these days I find myself easily distracted, and I don't sleep well at night. I'm afraid I might drag the team down, and I don't want to disappoint everyone. I'm trying my best to handle everything, but sometimes I really don't know what to do.

I've heard there's not much interest in our research lately, but I think that's actually pretty good. It allows us to explore more freely. Without unnecessary attention, we work like in a secret garden. I plan to maintain our work pace and keep the team in a relaxed and happy mood because, after all, the best ideas often come from the most relaxed state.

I heard our research isn't getting much attention lately, which makes me a bit disappointed. It seems like our work hasn't made any waves. Maybe our direction is completely wrong. And internationally, no one seems to care about what we're doing, making me feel like we're fighting a losing battle. I think I might need to reconsider our strategy. Perhaps we should abandon this project and focus on something more popular.

dialog.content:
Alright, we'll go with your suggestion. (The leader then called Zhao Zheng for a discussion) Zhao Zheng, it seems our fusion technology exam plan has stirred quite the controversy. To avoid any tension, we must reconsider.

(To prevent a nuclear war, the nation urgently halted the exam plan for the controlled nuclear fusion technology. After discussions, the exam topic was changed to how humanity can develop peacefully. It was initially thought this topic would garner global support, but unexpectedly, many countries opposed it. They considered it too dangerous, potentially touching on significant issues in politics, military, culture, and other areas, with humanity not ready to face the answer. Thus, this topic was also scrapped. Xiao Ming is now more than just a student who could score 750 in exams; he's a highly dangerous weapon. Survival or destruction, that’s an international issue. For peace, the nation proposed making the technology public and sharing the answer internationally. After prolonged negotiations, the United Nations finally decided on the exam scope with the goal of benefiting all humanity, including topics like artificial organs, cancer treatment, nanotechnology, etc. However, the exact execution will have to align with your learning progress. Xiao Ming's life is overwhelmed with endless studies, seen either as an all-powerful god or the most fearsome weapon. Almost no one remembers that aside from scoring 750, Xiao Ming is just an ordinary person who licks the yogurt lid.)

Indeed, Leader. This decision is wise. We changed the exam topic to peaceful development, thinking it would win global support, but many nations opposed it. They found the question too dangerous, as it could involve important issues in political, military, and cultural fields, and humanity is not ready for such an answer. Therefore, the question was rejected. Xiao Ming is now more than just a high schooler scoring 750; he's a highly dangerous weapon. Survival or destruction, this is an international issue. We need to find a more neutral, acceptable research direction.

I agree. We have proposed making the technology public, hoping to ease international pressure. The United Nations also intervened, suggesting new exam topics, such as artificial organs, cancer treatment, medical technology, and nanotechnology. But the detailed implementation will depend on Xiao Ming's learning pace.

Alright, as you instructed, I will inform Xiao Ming right away. However, I'm a bit worried about Xiao Ming. His life is drowning in endless study, and people either see him as an omnipotent god or the scariest weapon. Almost no one remembers that besides scoring 750, Xiao Ming is just an ordinary person who licks the yogurt lid.

(Zhao Zheng told Xiao Ming about the leader's decision and offered him comforting encouragement) (Xiao Ming can no longer handle such immense study and mental pressure, and his dependence on special medications is growing.) Perhaps this will be the last exam, and I hope I can deliver a satisfactory answer.
Are you sure your body can handle this? You don't seem to be in the best condition lately.
Whether I can or not, I must. Don't worry; I'll get myself together.
Good luck, Xiao Ming. You can do it.

I don't feel ready this time, but whatever, I'll just pull myself together! (Xiao Ming was supposed to lose consciousness, but nothing happened. The score of 750 never appeared again, and speculation about the disappearance of Xiao Ming's abilities is rife.)

Extended fatigue left Xiao Ming mentally and physically exhausted, losing his supernatural abilities during the exam. Without his powers, Xiao Ming chose to retreat into the mountains, seeking an easier life. Einstein's relativity states that time and space are not separate entities but interconnected. What is time, truly? Perhaps in a higher-dimensional world, time is static. The past seems like a cave, and the future like a hill to be crossed freely. The multidimensional space leak caused this world's space-time distortion, and achieving a score of 750 in the exam is an anomaly. Who knows if the circuits of multidimensional space will occur again, and on whom they will descend next?
Alright. Since you are so determined and confident, I'll entrust this project to you. We shouldn’t worry about external opinions for now; focusing on our research is our priority.

Driven by Xiaoming's stubbornness, the study of nuclear fusion technology proceeded forcefully, ignoring warnings and opposition from the international community. However, due to poor management and lack of safety measures, an experiment spiraled out of control, leading to a catastrophic accident. The resulting radiation and energy release caused extensive environmental destruction, forcing countless people to abandon their homes and severely threatening ecological balance. This incident caused global panic and turmoil, tightened international relations, and impacted economic and social order. Xiaoming's research team was disbanded as a result, and he himself became mired in deep guilt and legal troubles, transforming from a celebrated scientist into a target of public condemnation. This event serves as a historical lesson, reminding humanity that in the pursuit of technological advancement, safety and ethical responsibility must be given greater importance.
Please consider it more carefully.

Though it’s unclear how it happened, being hit by luck twice is enough to prove you are the chosen one. Your relentless crying, fussing, and refusal to sleep for four days and three nights just to get into a prestigious school have only led the admissions offices to watch without daring to take risks. You had no choice but to agree to the numerous demands of the investigation team and cooperate obediently. Ultimately, due to the lack of crucial evidence, you had to proceed to the volunteer selection stage. Xiaoming confidently chose a prestigious school, but soon after enrollment, he couldn't adjust to the course content and class pace, leading to his decision to drop out. After extensive media coverage, he suffered unprecedented online abuse and has been in a slump ever since.
Alright, since that’s the case, there's nothing more I can do.

Public opinion is a double-edged sword. Xiao Ming's situation was exploited by those with ulterior motives, spiraling out of control. Eventually, due to rumors spread by various factions severely disrupting social order, he was detained.
Good child, your wish has been fulfilled. Open the bedside drawer, there's a card worth 750W, and it's yours.

The immense wealth did not bring true happiness. Xiaoming's life became busy and stressful, burdened by various interpersonal and business matters. Friends and relatives frequently asked him for loans, and incidents of fraud and extortion occurred frequently. Xiaoming gradually felt lonely and helpless, losing the simple happiness he once had. Eventually, he realized that money could not replace true joy and satisfaction, so he decided to donate most of his wealth to seek inner peace and happiness again.
